*[[White Flute#Shops|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]] }} == Description == The '''White Flute''' is a type of [[Flutes|Flute]]. By using Normal, Bug, and Rock Gems the White Flute increases the player's Exp Yield. == Details == White Flute increases the player's Exp Yield by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%. Costs a variable amount of Normal, Bug, and Rock Gems when active, cost based on how many total Flutes are active. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Fallarbor_Town_Gem_Master|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]]| 10,000 [[File:Normal_Gem.png|30px]]
